scripts.start: cross-env CI=true DANGEROUSLY_DISABLE_HOST_CHECK=true PORT=3010 REACT_APP_SRC=back react-scripts start
scripts.start:fake: cross-env CI=true DANGEROUSLY_DISABLE_HOST_CHECK=true PORT=3010 REACT_APP_SRC=fake react-scripts start
